Through a series of flashbacks, four young chinese women born in America and their respective mothers born in feudal China, explore their past. This search will help them understand their difficult mother/daughter relationship.
Click to download the subtitle into your local device storage.
It seems that your device does not support torrent downloading. It would be better to use an external torrent client eg: Bit-Torrent.
Click to immediately start download in app or press and hold to see other download options.
Previous torrent download files are detected, do you want to delete it? Deleting it will cause re-downloading of whole stream. Could be useful when switching from quality 720p to 1080p.
Hint: Try searching by title, actor/director name, imdb code containing it.
To keep track of the things that you want to watch, just add to it favourites.
Set the default YTS website url.
Sometimes you might\'ve to restart the app for theme to get applied properly.
Enable spoofing of ip location while downloading torrent movies.
Current directory structure is not supported
Create a github issue in the official repository
Want a give a feedback just hit me up
Connect to wifi device or hotspot
Stop casting from the menu to show normal play button.
Tap to see your account information
Download some movies to watch them even from here.
